title: Iran admits sending drones to Russia 'before war in Ukraine'
description: Iran admitted for the first time on Saturday that it has sent drones to Russia, but insisted they were supplied before the Russian invasion of Ukraine. This comes as tensions with the West escalated over protests in the country, Iranian aid to Russian war effort in Ukraine, and fears over Iran's nuclear program. Follow our blog for the day's developments. All are in Paris time (GMT + 1).
dc:creator: FRANCE 24
